text: Shiva Ka Insaaf (Shiva's Justice) is a 1985 movie from India. It was India's first superhero movie and the first 3D movie to be filmed in the Hindi language. The stars are Jackie Shroff, Shakti Kapoor and Poonam Dhillon. ==Plot== A young boy learns how to fight and grows up into a superhero who helps people and finds the people who killed his parents. His powers come from his belief in the god Shiva. ==What people thought== Manawz Ashodia of Film Keeday named Shiva Ka Insaaf #8 on the top ten Indian films about people who fight crime. This movie won a Filmfare Award for Best Sound Recordist. ==Legacy== Jackie Shroff's son, Tiger Shroff has said he wants to play Shiva if there is ever a remake of this movie. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1985 action movies Category:1985 movies Category:1980s Indian movies Category:Superhero movies
